name: CheckCommitSignatureVerification
description:
Fetches verification status of a commit's signature on GitHub.

Use this tool to check whether a commit's signature in a GitHub repository is verified. It provides details about the verification status, including whether it's verified, the reason for the status, and details about the signature and payload. Call this tool when you need to verify the authenticity of a commit.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. This value is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to verify the commit signature. Not case-sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: start_commit_sha_or_branch
parameters.description: SHA or branch to start listing commits from. Defaults to the repository's default branch, usually 'main'.

value_schema.description: SHA or branch to start listing commits from. Default: the repository’s default branch (usually `main`).

parameters.name: commit_file_path_filter
parameters.description: Specify a file path to filter commits that only include changes to this path.

value_schema.description: Only commits containing this file path will be returned.

parameters.name: commit_author_filter
parameters.description: GitHub login or email address to filter commits by author.

value_schema.description: GitHub login or email address by which to filter by commit author.

parameters.name: updated_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp in ISO 8601 format to filter notifications updated after this time.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: only_commits_before_date
parameters.description: Filter commits to only include those before this date, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: Only commits before this date will be returned. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of commits to return per page, up to a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch, used for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
